original_text: On the second day of the month, the heads of all the families, along with the priests and the Levites, gathered around Ezra the teacher to give attention to the words of the Law.
korean_text: 그 이튿날 뭇 백성의 족장들과 제사장들과 레위 사람들이 율법의 말씀을 밝히 알고자 하여 학사 에스라에게 모여서

sentences.original_text: On the second day of the month
the heads of all the families
along with the priests and the Levites
to give attention to the words of the Law
